001package Calibration_Plugins_1;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
006import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data.CalibrationImage;
007import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
008
009/**
010 * Opens Zhang's standard calibration images as a stack of RGB images. The image data are stored as a resource in the
011 * local Java class tree. Also demonstrates the use of the resource access mechanism.
012 *
013 * @author WB
014 * @version 2021/08/22
015 */
016public class Open_Image_Stack implements PlugIn {
017        
018        static ImageResource resource = CalibrationImage.CalibImageStack;
019
020        public void run(String args) {
021                
022                if (resource == null) {
023                        IJ.error("Could not find resource " + resource);
024                        return;
025                }
026                
027                // if (resource.isInsideJar())
028                //      IJ.log("Loading resources from JAR file: " + resource.getURL());
029                // else
030                //      IJ.log("Loading resources from regular file: " + resource.getURL());
031                
032                ImagePlus im = resource.getImagePlus();
033                if (im != null) {
034                        im.show();
035                }
036                else {
037                        IJ.error("Could not open image " + resource);
038                }
039        }
040        
041}
